grid.name: 用户信息
grid.sql: select u.*,(case when u.loginflag = 0 then '未登陆' else '已登陆' end) as loginflagname from userstb_yj u

grid.name: 模型关联管理
grid.sql: select a.*, (select contant from dicinfo where fieldname = 'AuditType' and code=char(a.audittype)) as audittypename, (select contant from dicinfo where fieldname = 'AuditProgressFlag' and code=char(a.progressflag)) as progressflagname from ad_projecttb a where a.audithead like '%:userid%' or audittrail like '%:userid%' or auditmember like '%:userid%' and a.progressflag <> 99 order by a.progressflag asc,a.auditid desc

grid.name: 已关联内容
grid.sql: select a.*,(select username from userstb_yj where a.userid = userid) as username from ad_modelresultinfo a where a.auditid=':auditid'

grid.name: 未关联内容
grid.sql: select a.*,(select username from userstb_yj where a.userid = userid) as username from ad_modelresultinfo a where a.userid=':userid' and a.auditid is null order by a.time desc

grid.name: 上传文件管理
grid.sql: select a.*, (select contant from dicinfo where fieldname = 'UploadFileType' and code=char(a.filetype)) as filetypename, (select username from userstb_yj where userid=a.uploaduser) as username from ad_uploadfilemanage a

grid.name: 已处理事项
客户关联人查询
grid.sql: select linkcustid,linkname, (select selename from selectinfo where typeid = 9 and selectid = c.linkrela) as linkrelaname from custlink c where c.custid = :custid

grid.name: 客户大事记
grid.sql: select * from custevent c where c.custid = :custid

grid.name: 还款计划表查询
grid.sql: select organid, (select organname from organinfo where organid = d.organid) as organname, loanid, (select loanname from loaninfo where loanid = d.loanid) as loanname, contractid, (select custname from custbasicinfo where custid = d.custid) as custname, (select username from userinfo where userid = d.custmgrid) as username, loanamt,loanlimit from duebillinfo d
grid.fieldsDefine: [ {name:'organname',header:'机构名称',filter:{type:'string'}}, {name:'contractid',header:'合同号' ,sortable:true,summaryType:'count',filter:{type:'string'}}, {name:'custname',header:'客户名称' ,groupable:true,filter:{type:'string'}}, {name:'loanname',header:'贷款种类' ,groupable:true}, {name:'username',header:'客户经理' ,groupable:true,filter:{type:'string'}}, {name:'loanlimit',header:'贷款期限',sortable:true,xtype:'numbercolumn',format:'0,000',align:'right',filter:{type:'numeric'}}, {name:'loanamt',header:'贷款金额' ,sortable:true,xtype:'numbercolumn',format:'￥0,000.00',align:'right',summaryType:'sum',filter:{type:'numeric'}} ]

grid.name: 参数维护
机构维护
grid.sql: select o.*,(select count(*) from organinfo where parent = o.organid) as childcount from organinfo o where 1=1

grid.name: 用户角色管理
grid.sql: select * from groupinfo order by groupid

grid.name: 用户管理
grid.sql: select o.*,(select count(*) from organinfo where parent = o.organid) as childcount from organinfo o where 1=1
select a.*,(case when a.enableflag = 1 then '有效' else '无效' end) as enableflagname from classinfo a
